## Welcome to the ***Lompoc Edible Trail Project*** info page! This site was created to stay transparent. You will be able to check out the timeline, track progress, stay informed, or get engaged.

# Proposed Solution

<div style="max-height:300px; overflow-y:auto; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ccc;"> To address limited food access and fragmented green infrastructure, this project proposes a community-driven edible and ecological trail system. It will transform underutilized public spaces into green corridors providing fresh food, environmental benefits, and social cohesion.<br><br> The trail will include fruit & nut trees, native plants, shaded paths, educational signage, and produce-sharing kiosks â€” creating multifunctional spaces blending ecology and food production. </div>

# Community Engagement & Co-Design

<div style="max-height:300px; overflow-y:auto; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #ccc;"> Sustained community involvement is key, with workshops, advisory committees, and participatory design. The project embraces local narratives, bilingual signage, and culturally relevant elements to foster trust and long-term stewardship. </div>


# Proposed Timeline


```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(timevis)

phase_colors <- c(
  "Phase 1" = "#5dade2",
  "Phase 2" = "#58d68d",
  "Phase 3" = "#f5b041"
)

tasks <- data.frame(
  id = 1:9,
  content = c(
    "Community Intro & Feedback",
    "Advisory Committee Formation",
    "Site Selection",
    "Fundraising",
    "Installation",
    "Community Planting",
    "Programming Launch",
    "Maintenance",
    "Monitoring & Expansion"
  ),
  start = c(
    "2025-10-01", "2025-12-01", "2026-01-01",
    "2026-03-01", "2026-06-01", "2026-07-01",
    "2026-09-01", "2026-12-01", "2027-03-01"
  ),
  end = c(
    "2025-11-30", "2025-12-31", "2026-02-28",
    "2026-05-31", "2026-07-31", "2026-08-31",
    "2026-11-30", "2027-05-31", "2027-09-30"
  ),
  group = c(
    "Phase 1", "Phase 1", "Phase 1",
    "Phase 1", "Phase 2", "Phase 2",
    "Phase 2", "Phase 3", "Phase 3"
  ),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

timevis(tasks)


```



# Trail Map


```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = -120.444229, lat = 34.666243, popup = "Lompoc Riverbend Trail Start") %>%
  addMarkers(lng = -120.435763, lat = 34.647437, popup = "Lompoc Riverbend Trail End") %>%
  addCircleMarkers(
    lng = c(-120.442545, -120.442917),
    lat = c(34.660277, 34.660787),
    label = c("Proposed Segment 1", "Proposed Segment 2"),
    color = c("red4", "yellow3")
  )



```
